trekking_sites.name: Har Ki Dun Trek
trekking_sites.description: Har Ki Dun, also known as Valley of Gods, is a cradle-shaped hanging valley in the Garhwal Himalayas. The trek takes you through scenic landscapes, lush green meadows, and dense pine forests, offering mesmerizing views of the Swargarohini peaks.
trekking_sites.BestTime: April to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Hampta Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Hampta Pass Trek is known for its dramatic landscapes, including lush green valleys and barren landscapes. The trail takes you from Kullu Valley to Lahaul and offers breathtaking views of the Pir Panjal range.

trekking_sites.name: Nag Tibba Trek
trekking_sites.description: Nag Tibba Trek is a perfect weekend getaway for adventure enthusiasts. The trail offers panoramic views of the snow-capped Himalayan peaks and the Nag Tibba Range.

trekking_sites.name: Sar Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Sar Pass Trek takes you through pine forests, meadows, and quaint villages. The trail offers stunning views of the Parvati Valley and the snow-capped peaks of the Himalayas.

trekking_sites.name: Milam Glacier Trek
trekking_sites.description: Milam Glacier Trek is a high-Altitude trek in the Kumaon region, known for its pristine beauty and panoramic views of the surrounding peaks. The trek takes you to the Milam Glacier, one of the largest glaciers in the region.

trekking_sites.name: Pin Parvati Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Pin Parvati Pass Trek is a challenging expedition that takes you from the lush greenery of the Parvati Valley to the barren landscapes of Spiti. The trail offers diverse terrains, river crossings, and stunning views.

trekking_sites.name: Pindari Glacier Trek
trekking_sites.description: Pindari Glacier Trek takes you to the Pindari Glacier, surrounded by snow-capped peaks and lush green meadows. The trek offers a glimpse of traditional Himalayan villages and stunning landscapes.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Deo Tibba Base Camp Trek
trekking_sites.description: Deo Tibba Base Camp Trek offers breathtaking views of Deo Tibba, Indrasan, and other snow-clad peaks. The trail takes you through alpine meadows, dense forests, and picturesque landscapes.

trekking_sites.name: Brahmatal Trek
trekking_sites.description: Brahmatal Trek takes you to the pristine Brahmatal Lake surrounded by snow-clad peaks. The trail offers a mix of oak and rhododendron forests, meadows, and panoramic views of the Himalayas.

trekking_sites.name: Indrahar Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Indrahar Pass Trek offers stunning views of the Dhauladhar range and the Kangra Valley. The trek takes you through lush green meadows, dense forests, and ancient temples.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Kuari Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Kuari Pass Trek, also known as the Lord Curzon Trail, offers panoramic views of the Nanda Devi, Kamet, Dronagiri, and other Himalayan peaks. The trek takes you through beautiful meadows and dense forests.
trekking_sites.BestTime: April to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Malana-Chandrakhani Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Malana-Chandrakhani Pass Trek takes you to the ancient village of Malana and the beautiful Chandrakhani Pass. The trek offers cultural insights and stunning views of the Parvati Valley.

trekking_sites.name: Auden's Col Trek
trekking_sites.description: Auden's Col Trek is a challenging high-Altitude trek that connects Gangotri and Kedarnath. The trek offers breathtaking views of the Gangotri Group of peaks and the Chaukhamba Range.

trekking_sites.name: Kheerganga Trek
trekking_sites.description: Kheerganga Trek is a popular trek known for its natural hot springs. The trail takes you through lush greenery, waterfalls, and panoramic views of the Parvati Valley.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Panchachuli Base Camp Trek
trekking_sites.description: Panchachuli Base Camp Trek offers stunning views of the Panchachuli peaks and the Darma Valley. The trek takes you through ancient villages, dense forests, and alpine meadows.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Bhrigu Lake Trek
trekking_sites.description: Bhrigu Lake Trek offers panoramic views of the Bhrigu Lake, surrounded by snow-capped peaks. The trek takes you through lush meadows and offers a high-Altitude experience.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Rupin Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Rupin Pass Trek is a challenging trek known for its diverse landscapes, including waterfalls, forests, and meadows. The trail offers breathtaking views of the Rupin River Valley.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Chandratal Baralacha Trek
trekking_sites.description: Chandratal Baralacha Trek takes you to the stunning Chandratal Lake and Baralacha La. The trek offers breathtaking views of the Lahaul Valley and high mountain passes.

trekking_sites.name: Bali Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Bali Pass Trek is a challenging high-Altitude trek that connects the Har Ki Dun Valley to the Yamunotri Valley. The trail offers spectacular views of the Swargarohini peaks.

trekking_sites.name: Bara Bhangal Trek
trekking_sites.description: Bara Bhangal Trek is a remote and less-explored trek that takes you to the Bara Bhangal village. The trail offers a unique cultural experience and views of the Dhauladhar range.

trekking_sites.name: Dayara Bugyal Trek
trekking_sites.description: Dayara Bugyal Trek is known for its vast meadows and panoramic views of the Himalayan peaks. The trek offers a serene experience in the alpine meadows.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Kugti Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Kugti Pass Trek is a challenging trek that takes you through remote villages and beautiful landscapes. The trail offers stunning views of the Pir Panjal range.

trekking_sites.name: Kafni Glacier Trek
trekking_sites.description: Kafni Glacier Trek takes you to the pristine Kafni Glacier surrounded by panoramic views of the Nanda Kot and Nanda Bhanar peaks. The trek offers a remote and serene experience.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Sar Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Sar Pass Trek takes you through pine forests, meadows, and quaint villages. The trail offers stunning views of the Parvati Valley and the snow-capped peaks of the Himalayas.

trekking_sites.name: Milam Glacier Trek
trekking_sites.description: Milam Glacier Trek is a high-Altitude trek in the Kumaon region, known for its pristine beauty and panoramic views of the surrounding peaks. The trek takes you to the Milam Glacier, one of the largest glaciers in the region.

trekking_sites.name: Pin Parvati Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Pin Parvati Pass Trek is a challenging expedition that takes you from the lush greenery of the Parvati Valley to the barren landscapes of Spiti. The trail offers diverse terrains, river crossings, and stunning views.

trekking_sites.name: Pindari Glacier Trek
trekking_sites.description: Pindari Glacier Trek takes you to the Pindari Glacier, surrounded by snow-capped peaks and lush green meadows. The trek offers a glimpse of traditional Himalayan villages and stunning landscapes.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Deo Tibba Base Camp Trek
trekking_sites.description: Deo Tibba Base Camp Trek offers breathtaking views of Deo Tibba, Indrasan, and other snow-clad peaks. The trail takes you through alpine meadows, dense forests, and picturesque landscapes.

trekking_sites.name: Brahmatal Trek
trekking_sites.description: Brahmatal Trek takes you to the pristine Brahmatal Lake surrounded by snow-clad peaks. The trail offers a mix of oak and rhododendron forests, meadows, and panoramic views of the Himalayas.

trekking_sites.name: Hampta Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Hampta Pass Trek is known for its dramatic landscapes, including lush green valleys and barren landscapes of Lahaul. The trek takes you to the Hampta Pass, offering breathtaking views of the Himalayas.

trekking_sites.name: Har Ki Dun Trek
trekking_sites.description: Har Ki Dun Trek is a classic trek in the Garhwal Himalayas, known for its picturesque beauty and ancient villages. The trail takes you to the Har Ki Dun Valley surrounded by snow-capped peaks.
trekking_sites.BestTime: April to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Manimahesh Lake Trek
trekking_sites.description: Manimahesh Lake Trek takes you to the sacred Manimahesh Lake, surrounded by the stunning backdrop of the Pir Panjal range. The trek is known for its religious significance and breathtaking views.

trekking_sites.name: Gomukh Tapovan Trek
trekking_sites.description: Gomukh Tapovan Trek takes you to the source of the Ganges River, Gomukh, and the high-Altitude meadows of Tapovan. The trek offers panoramic views of the Bhagirathi peaks.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Indrahar Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Indrahar Pass Trek offers stunning views of the Dhauladhar range and the Kangra Valley. The trek takes you to the Indrahar Pass at an Altitude of 4,342 meters.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Auden's Col Trek
trekking_sites.description: Auden's Col Trek is a challenging high-Altitude trek that connects the Rudugaira Valley to the Bhilangna Valley. The trail crosses the Auden's Col at an Altitude of 5,490 meters.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Friendship Peak Trek
trekking_sites.description: Friendship Peak Trek is a popular trek in the Pir Panjal range, known for its stunning views and relatively moderate difficulty. The trek takes you to the Friendship Peak at an Altitude of 5,289 meters.

trekking_sites.name: Roopkund Lake Trek
trekking_sites.description: Roopkund Lake Trek is famous for the mysterious Roopkund Lake, also known as the Skeleton Lake, due to the presence of human skeletons at its bottom. The trek offers stunning views of the Trishul peaks.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to October

trekking_sites.name: Sach Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Sach Pass Trek is a challenging trek that takes you through the picturesque landscapes of the Chamba Valley. The trail offers views of the Pangi Valley and the Great Himalayan Range.

trekking_sites.name: Kedarkantha Trek
trekking_sites.description: Kedarkantha Trek is a popular winter trek known for its snow-covered landscapes and stunning views of the Himalayas. The trail takes you to the Kedarkantha Peak at an Altitude of 3,810 meters.

trekking_sites.name: Chandrakhani Pass Trek
trekking_sites.description: Chandrakhani Pass Trek takes you through beautiful meadows, dense forests, and charming villages. The trail offers panoramic views of the Parvati Valley and the Chandrakhani Pass at an Altitude of 3,660 meters.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Gauri Shankar Trek
trekking_sites.description: Gauri Shankar Trek is a scenic trek that takes you to the base of Gauri Shankar Peak, one of the highest peaks in the Indian Himalayas. The trail offers breathtaking views of the surrounding peaks and alpine meadows.
trekking_sites.BestTime: May to June, September to November

trekking_sites.name: Malana Village Trek
trekking_sites.description: Malana Village Trek takes you to the isolated village of Malana, known for its distinct culture and traditions. The trail offers views of the Malana Glacier and snow-capped peaks.

trekking_sites.name: Nag Tibba Trek
trekking_sites.description: Nag Tibba Trek is a perfect trek for beginners, offering stunning views of the Swargarohini and Bandarpoonch peaks. The trail takes you to the Nag Tibba summit at an Altitude of 3,022 meters.
